scripts.migrate_up: DATABASE_URL=postgres://$(grep POSTGRES_USER .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2):$(grep POSTGRES_PASSWORD .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2)@localhost:$(grep POSTGRES_PORT .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2)/$(grep POSTGRES_DB .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2) node-pg-migrate up
scripts.migrate_down: DATABASE_URL=postgres://$(grep POSTGRES_USER .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2):$(grep POSTGRES_PASSWORD .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2)@localhost:$(grep POSTGRES_PORT .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2)/$(grep POSTGRES_DB .env.local | cut -d '=' -f2) node-pg-migrate down
